text:
@paleofuture Actually, according the CDC, 2009's H1N1 had a global mortality rate of between 0.001 to 0.007%.

That is MAGNITUDES lower than the mortality rate of Coronavirus which has ranged from 15.9% in the early days to .2-5%.

Details:
https://t.co/DXthAsnoMf

https://t.co/HRhL73l8PN
